title: Republicans feud over Trump, Cheney and immigration; Plus Facebook upholds Trump ban
description:
The internal feud between House Republicans broke out into the open once again this week, as Liz Cheney, the number three Republican, faces calls for her ouster from leadership because she continues to disagree with former President Trump. Chuck is joined by deputy editorial page editor for the Washington Post, Ruth Marcus and Lachlan Markay, politics reporter at Axios.

Plus, former GOP congressman Reid Ribble discusses the GOP’s changes on immigration.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
